welcome_message_body: Welcome to Juiz de Fora, where the charm of its historic architecture and vibrant cultural scene awaits you. Known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Padaria Linda
restaurants.description: Padaria Linda is a bakery located in Juiz de Fora.
restaurants.address: R. Bar. de S. João Nepomuceno, 406, Juiz de Fora, MG

restaurants.name: Piazza Domenico Restaurante
restaurants.description: Piazza Domenico Restaurante is a brazilian restaurant located in Juiz de Fora.
restaurants.address: Central Shopping (Loja 111), Juiz de Fora, MG

restaurants.name: Bombonière e Lanchonete Pipita
restaurants.description: Bombonière e Lanchonete Pipita is a diner located in Juiz de Fora.
restaurants.address: Gal. Ten. Belfort Arantes, 28, Juiz de Fora, MG

restaurants.name: Pedra Bonita Café
restaurants.description: Pedra Bonita Café is a café located in Juiz de Fora.
restaurants.address: Av. Bar. do Rio Branco, 2985, Juiz de Fora, MG

restaurants.name: São Bartolomeu
restaurants.description: São Bartolomeu is a gastropub located in Juiz de Fora.
restaurants.address: R. S. Mateus, 41, Juiz de Fora, MG, 36025-000

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco De Assis Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
